actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the inspection and receipt of tax records by the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice.

summary.text: Authorizes the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice to inspect and receive specified tax-related materials with respect to named ABSCAM defendants and witnesses.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the inspection and receipt of tax records by the Select Committee to Study Law Enforcement Undercover Activities of Components of the Department of Justice.
